summary: A young woman, played by Martha Plimpton learns of her adoption and eventually quits her law firm job in NYC and goes on a journey to find her birth mother - played by Jaqueline Bissett.
cast: Jacqueline Bisset|Martha Plimpton|Nick Stahl|Amy Madigan|Frankie Faison|Carmen Zapata|Peggy Gormley|Seymour Cassel|Molly Price|Kate McGregor-Stewart|Clara Bellar|Justin Theroux|Mark Tymchyshyn|Anibal O. Lleras|Phyllis Somerville|Robert Hogan|Lola Pashalinski|Robin Weigert|Johnny Arkoosh|Rain Phoenix|Jessica Brooks Grant|Louise Fernandez|E. Hernandez|Kimberly Scott|Sarah Lassez|Aaron Amara Davis|Pepe Atramontes|Randall Slavin|Stephanie Barton-Farcas
title: The Sleepy Time Gal
